com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.extensions

Class SynchronizedExtension<ExtensionView,ExtensionSettings>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.extensions.SynchronizedExtension<ExtensionView,ExtensionSettings>
  • Type Parameters:
    ExtensionView - the generic type
    ExtensionSettings - the generic type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientExtension<ExtensionView,ExtensionSettings>, ExtensionPresenterFactory<ExtensionView,ExtensionSettings>, ExtensionViewFactory<ExtensionView>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdvancedOptionsExtension, FilterExtension, SegmentationExtension

    public abstract class SynchronizedExtension<ExtensionView,ExtensionSettings>
extends Object
implements ClientExtension<ExtensionView,ExtensionSettings>
    A SynchronizedExtension is an extension which is localized and invoked by correct thread by using the ThreadSyncWrapperAndLocalizationSetter.
